column8: a crane collapsed on a house
column9: causing the deaths of five people and five others were seriously injured in Sangkat Phsar Kandal
column12: behind the post office.------The dead and injured are so far reported to all be young women. The bodies of the victims and the injured were taken to the New Land Referral Hospital.------After the incident
column13: local authorities went down to the above location to intervene. More details to come. ------POST NEWS
